mapper.select: select * from trendshare where ts_del='n' order by ts_regdate desc
select tr.ts_id, count(ts_id) reply_count from reply r, ts_reply tr where r.reply_id = tr.reply_id group by ts_id

select * from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, tr.* from trendshare tr, (select @ROWNUM:=0) rn order by tr.ts_like desc) a left outer join (select tr.ts_id, count(ts_id) reply_count from reply r, ts_reply tr where r.reply_id = tr.reply_id group by ts_id) rc on rc.ts_id = a.ts_id where a.ROWNUM between 1 and 8 order by a.ts_like desc

select * from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, tr.* from trendshare tr, (select @ROWNUM:=0) rn order by tr.ts_regdate desc) a left outer join (select tr.ts_id, count(ts_id) reply_count from reply r, ts_reply tr where r.reply_id = tr.reply_id group by ts_id) rc on rc.ts_id = a.ts_id where a.ROWNUM between 1 and 8 order by a.ts_regdate desc
select * from trendshare where ts_del='n'and mem_id=#{mem_id} order by ts_regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into trendshare(ts_content,mem_id, mem_name, ts_img_name) values(#{ts_content}, #{mem_id},#{mem_name},#{ts_img_name})
mapper.select: select * from (select tr.ts_id,count(*) reply_count from reply r, ts_reply tr where tr.ts_id = #{ts_id} and r.reply_id = tr.reply_id and reply_del='n' order by reply_regdate desc) r_count, trendshare ts where r_count.ts_id = ts.ts_id;
select * from trendshare where ts_del='n' and ts_id=#{ts_id}
mapper.update: update trendshare set ts_like = ts_like + 1 where ts_id=#{ts_id};
update trendshare set ts_readcount = ts_readcount + 1 where ts_id=#{ts_id};
mapper.select: select ts_like from trendshare where ts_id = #{ts_id}
select tr.ts_id, r.reply_id, r.reply_content, r.mem_id, r.mem_name, r.reply_regdate from reply r, ts_reply tr where r.reply_id = tr.reply_id and reply_del='n' order by reply_regdate desc
select count(ts_id) reply_count from reply r, ts_reply tr where tr.ts_id = #{ts_id} and r.reply_id = tr.reply_id group by ts_id;

select tr.ts_id, r.reply_id, r.reply_content, r.mem_id, r.mem_name, r.reply_regdate from reply r, ts_reply tr where tr.ts_id=#{ts_id} and r.reply_id = tr.reply_id and reply_del='n' order by reply_regdate desc
select * from reply r, ts_reply tr where tr.ts_id=#{ts_id} and tr.reply_id = #{reply_id} and r.reply_id = tr.reply_id and reply_del='n';
select * from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, tr.* from trendshare tr, (select @ROWNUM:=0) rn order by tr.ts_regdate desc) a where a.ROWNUM between ${startRow} and ${endRow};
select count(*) from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, tr.* from trendshare tr, (select @ROWNUM:=0) rn order by tr.ts_regdate desc) a
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_type, reply_content, mem_id, mem_name) values('feed',#{reply_content},#{mem_id},#{mem_name})
mapper.select: select * from trendshare where ts_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
